title: Christmas Helper

renewed-contributions.title: A Starry Night
renewed-contributions.note: Music by Miles, words by De Armond, written as work for hire for the Rodeheaver Company, which is the author for copyright purposes.

additional-notes: Renewals for this annual may be in the Books ection of the CCE, rather than in the Periodicals section (or the Contributions to Periodicals section, in years that include that).
This annual may include sheet music that has renewals under Music, rather than under Contributions to Periodicals. We have not systematically surveyed Music copyright renewals.
